attributes.action: Restrict ISPs limiting upload and download speeds at various times of the day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ISPs such as Virgin Media are advertising broadband speeds of 20mb/s... Recently the way they have described this is now "speeds of up to 20mb/s"

They have bgan limiting download speeds to that of a quarter what you are paying for, I know other various ISPs are doing this asewll and its just wrong..
